title: Cetera Financial Group rolls out Bitcoin ETF policy for financial advisors
description: Cetera Financial Group introduces a new bitcoin ETF policy, providing education and resources for advisors to navigate client investments.

title: U.S. State Department Study Urges Temporary Ban on Advanced AI
description: A recent study commissioned by the U.S. State Department, conducted by the consultancy firm Gladstone AI, has recommended the consideration of a temporary ban on artificial intelligence (AI) surpassing a certain computational power threshold. The study, spanning 247 pages, asserts that unchecked advancement in AI technology poses an existential threat to humanity, warranting immediate regulatory […]

title: Thetanuts Finance Launches Leveraged LRT Strategy Vault to Enable Further Composability with Pendle’s PT-eETH
description: Singapore, Singapore, March 14th, 2024, Chainwire Thetanuts Finance, the leading decentralized on-chain options protocol, announced that it has integrated Pendle Finance’s $PT-eETH offering to create a Leveraged LRT Strategy Vault on the Ethereum Mainnet.  This marks the protocol’s first foray into the world of restaking and Liquid Restaking Tokens (LRTs), a fast-growing primitive within the […]

title: Why aren’t large Bitcoin holders selling despite high prices? Insights and analysis
description: As Bitcoin prices soar, the wealthiest investors are holding onto their assets. What’s driving this choice, and how does it affect the market? In recent years, the number of large Bitcoin (BTC) holders, called “whales”, has increased significantly. Data from Glassnode…

title: Is Ethereum’s price headed to $5k after Dencun upgrade?
description: Ethereum's price is down 5% from last week’s peak, raising the question of whether the asset is heading to $5,000.

title: Memecoins surge led by Shiba Inu, KangaMoon, and Bonk
description: Meme coins are rising again, with Shiba Inu, KangaMoon, and Bonk leading the surge. Amid increasing investor interest, experts hint at possible new highs in 2024. #sponsored

title: SUI and Aptos Communities Put Their Faith in Milei Moneda – Expert Calls $MEDA the Token to Wealth
description: Despite its partnership with Athens Exchange, SUI’s price experienced a 9% decrease. Technical indicators suggest a “SELL” for SUI. title: Crypto Analyst Says Avalanche-Based Altcoin Primed for a Massive Move, Updates Outlook on Solana
description:
A widely followed crypto trader believes that one Avalanche (AVAX)-based altcoin is gearing up for a massive breakout. Pseudonymous analyst Kaleo tells his 620,300 followers on the social media platform X that the native governance token of TraderJoe (JOE), an automated market maker (AMM) decentralized exchange (DEX), could soar more than 28% from its current […]

The post Crypto Analyst Says Avalanche-Based Altcoin Primed for a Massive Move, Updates Outlook on Solana appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
